item.title: 在 VS Code 中使用 REST Client 扩展做 API 测试

item.description: @baseUrl = https://api.github.com/repos/olzhy/olzhy.github.io @accessToken = ghp_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx # @name createIssue POST {{baseUrl}}/issues Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}} { "title": "发现一个 Bug", "body": "请尽快解决！" } ### @newCreatedIssueNumber = {{createIssue.
